original_title: Juku-jo 熟女 トラッカー
overview: Hina is a high school student and lives in Dekotora, due to some problems with debts, Hina is challenged to drive truck, now she struggles every day to pay the debts left by her late husband, Maki, who in the end realizes the meaning Of true love and discovers the sheer passion for driving the truck to pay off the debt.
title: Juku-jo Trucker
